sentence: pick up the left one among the rear blue blocks and place it on the second red block you moved
pick up the left one among the rear blue blocks and place it on the foremost red block
pick up the left one among the other blue blocks and place it on the front red block
pick up the left one among the blue blocks in the back and place it on the front red block
pick up the left blue block that you have not moved yet and place it on top of the foremost red block
